website_summaries.verdict: Uses Jerusalem artichoke to formulate a prebiotic to stimulate good gut bacteria.
pros: Supplement has prebiotic plus 16 billion CFU of six probiotics strains per serving
cons: Some capsules appear to arrive empty

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product about a month. I definitely think it helps your body cleanse itself naturally. I don't feel bloated every day which has help my jeans fit better so that's a plus! I'm curious to see what the long term effects will be but so far this product seems to be working well. I did get some cramps at first but like all literature on probiotics say, it's part of your body adjusting to the product. You will go the bathroom a lot! Luckily for me, my schedule is usually twice a day, so it's not the frequency of bathroom trips it's just you go a lot when you do go. It's been an interesting experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR MY GUTT
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly intimidated by the size of the capsules and the directions indicate you are supposed to take 2. But honestly they are easy to take before a meal and I have noticed a decrease in feeling bloated. I know the comments are for details but I feel a little awkward going into too much detail, but I will see my tummy seems much flatter & I feel good taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii50

customer_reviews.title: once my body got acclimated to the product it has been great. I would definitely recommend for bloating
customer_reviews.text: I will say I am impressed by this product. I took it to help with excess bloating from being on birth control (BCP can mess with your gut flora) and I saw a dramatic change in a week or so of taking it. For the first week I definitely had more bathroom trips...but, once my body got acclimated to the product it has been great. I would definitely recommend for bloating.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everybody, including us WFPB (vegan) people!
customer_reviews.text: After changing to a whole-foods, plant-based (essentially, vegan without processed foods) lifestyle I became an avid label reader to look for hidden ingredients that are animal-based. Eventually, I realized that I needed to start looking carefully at the labels on my supplements, too. I loved my probiotic, but it wasn't vegan so I knew that I needed to change. I'm so glad that I found Ora Organic Probiotics. Not only has it provided me with the probiotics I need, but I'm also staying animal-free. Two other benefits; it's about $20 cheaper than my previous probiotic and it doesn't need to be refrigerated (which is a pain when traveling)!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Tummy says thanks
customer_reviews.text: We're on our third bottle of these little miracle workers at my house. I have a dairy sensitivity and have noticed an improvement with my GI since starting. The more impressive result has been with my husband, his tummy and my nose both greatly appreciate the decrease in flatulence. I can definitely tell on days when he has skipped taking these. If I had known how these were going to affect us we would have started them much sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn M. Ingersoll

customer_reviews.title: Causes stomach pain and other gastro-intestinal issues
customer_reviews.text: Started this product late Feb 2019. Had a very severe gastro-intestinal response mid March. Did not connect to Ora Organic immediately, but did discontinue taking Ora Organic to return to normal and to complete a round of prescribed Cipro. Have just resumed the product today, and lo, I am suffering severe upper and lower GI discomfort for the last 3 hours!!! There is something in Ora Organic that totally disagrees with my system. Throwing the remaining product out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was genuinely impressed with the Trust Your Gut Pre&Probiotic Capsules! Came in a blue glass jar, in perfect condition. I take them every morning with a glass of water to help ease any stomach issues or queasiness I may have during the day. Most people don't know, and I had to do some digging myself, but Probiotics on their own are not enough to completely help the digestion process. The Prebiotics in Ora's capsules give the Probiotics a necessary boost to be maximally effective- I haven't seen another product on the market that does this (and with non-synthetic ingredients too). I'm going to buy a subscription for them so I never run out!
customer_reviews.author: jane shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried, wont use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I tried a lot of different brands prior to these and will never go back. These are by far my fave. I've been using them for around 4 months now and they've been the most effective in having a positive impact on my gut health. Love that they are completely vegan and the ingredients are high quality. They are kinda pricy in comparison to some other brands but I truly believe you get what you pay for when it comes to these things, so I don't mind the price tag. They are worth every penny. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Teves

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Bloating
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these to help reduce bloating and boost my immune system. The first couple of days on these were rough (gas cramps), but things are running smoothly now. I take the pills at night on a full stomach to help avoid any stomach discomfort / embarrassing audible GI noises while they work their magic. I like that these pills don't require refrigeration; I can keep them on my bedside table and remember to take them nightly. I don't feel as bloated anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works for me because I am dairy sensitive. This has no dairy! Woot Woot!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Truly works
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally write reviews, but wow, this stuff is the real deal. Ive been having stomach problems for over 5 years now. With lack of appetite and overeating because I cant tell how much my stomach wants. Ive been taking these probitics every day for the past week, and after about day 4 I started feeling this deep hunger before my meals, and its been consistent since. This is life changing for me. Would highly recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre/Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this Pre, Pro-biotic for a few months, and I notice a difference in my health when I don’t take it. I also give it to my German Shepherd twice a day, it works great for both of us! Seems to even both of our digestive issues out
customer_reviews.author: Shylo

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the cost. Good health is priceless.
customer_reviews.text: For all of the selective cheapsakes out there, let me say I get it and understand. I’m outing myself to say don’t let the price tags scare you away. This is the real deal and you will feel the benefits. I’m always very skeptical and don’t believe in woo-woo, but their science is solid and so are the results. Plus, yay for glass bottles.
customer_reviews.author: hardworkingdiva

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a great difference in my digestive system quickly. Super customer service. Great company- will order from Ora Organic again.
customer_reviews.author: robin ogle

customer_reviews.title: Won't repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I was initially excited to try these due to them being both pre and probiotic. I have used a variety of probiotics (Custom Probiotics, Dr. renew Life, Dr Ohira's, etc.) and seen results in no more than 24 hours. I have been taking these for the past 4 days and actually I feel as though they are making me constipated. I have also been quite bloated. I will be gong back to Custom Probiotics as they are the best probiotic I have tried to date. I am so disappointed as I was hoping to add these to my rotation. I will stick with eating various veggies that are prebiotic.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Buying these types of products are always difficult. Everyone's body is different. I still do not have a confirmed diagnoses as to what is wrong with my stomach or why it doesn't seem to function properly. I have been told possibilities such as IBS and I have confirmed food allergies, which I now avoid of course. All I can say is, if I forget to take these for the day, I feel the difference. I am already on my second bottle because I love it. I did not have any side effects or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Feeling better!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive stomach (easily prone to upset & bloating), but since I've added Ora probiotics to my daily regimen, I have had fewer issues. I really appreciate that they are organically sourced since I eat primarily organic food.
customer_reviews.author: amgiddy

customer_reviews.title: Talk about a game changer to your gut health!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really works to keep your gut health and microbiome in check. With a change of lifestyle incorporating healthy eating, drinking lots of water and drinking your daily dose of this probiotics. I can tell a huge difference in my overall health, skin glowing, better sleep, it also has helped me curtail cravings. After careful research this was my #1 choice that has all the proper probiotics to aide in my overall gut health and microbiome!! Will be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Really great probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after reading how great good-bacteria is for your digestive system.... in a world where we live with and consume so much processed food, it's something we should all consider. The contents of these probiotics are bar none! They're a little pricey (personally, I'm not thrilled at another $30+ a month for vitamins) but after a month or two using these I've noticed a real positive change in my digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: cltucker916

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tablets in October however never really got around to starting them until January. The expiration date was 07/2020 so didn't think it would be an issue. After opening the bottle and inspecting the tablets, I noticed that the substance inside the capsules was hard as a rock. It was not powdery and I cannot imagine that it would be easily absorbed. I threw them out...just didn't seem right to me.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this for a week and ended up with serve rib pain went to the hospital and found out my liver and spleen was enlarged blood work fine everything else was fine but my liver and spleen were swollen stop this product real quick I would love to give it zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Valbona koths

customer_reviews.title: good vegan product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very grateful to find such a high-quality product that has absolutely no animal products whatsoever, including the medium on which they grow the probiotics in the first place! Plus, it includes prebiotics so my gut health is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I recently stopped using another brand of probiotics because I felt like they weren't working. I saw the Ora Trust Your Gut probiotics and decided to give it another try after some research. These contain both prebiotics & probiotics for maximum efficacy. I was also like that these supplement are vegan, gluten-free and non-gmo. I could feel them working after the 3rd day and I already notice improvement in my digestion. It comes in a glass jar which is an added bonus as I'm trying to reduce plastic waste!
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Caused extreme discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Literally the absolute worst probiotic I’ve ever taken. I am a pretty healthy person who works out regularly. This made me extremely bloated. So bloated that it hurt... I took it for about two weeks and it’s been about a month since I discontinued use.. I am still not back to normal. Stomach pain, IBS symptoms, bloating, gas... all things I’ve never had before introducing this into my diet. Sad because the reviews are great...
customer_reviews.author: S Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I made
customer_reviews.text: So I waited till I finished the bottle to write a review. A little of myself, I’m 30 Hispanic and I was always constipated. I eat a lot of Mexican food, meats, and carbs. I do drink mostly water. Anyways first time taking probiotics. I am so happy I went with this brand, I’ve been taking two each day before or during a big meal. Sometimes I would forget and take it right after. But gurrrrlll let me tell you, I been going to the bathroom more regularly my stomach feels better not bloated at all. I’m happy with my purchase, about to order my next bottle now.
customer_reviews.author: MissFlores

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is now my GO-TO pro/prebiotic. It has helped my constant upset stomach tremendously and the bloating I once encountered on a daily basis is now gone! If you are gluten and lactose intolerant, this is the pro/prebiotic for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bottles. I never saw any change. Didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Caused stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these probiotics are the only ones I’ve used that cause terrible stomach pain for me. I’ve bought two bottles on two different occasions to make sure it was them causing the upset. I now use golive. I’m sure they work for some but for those who it bothers is recommend trying golive brand
customer_reviews.author: T Berry

customer_reviews.title: Has plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because there was no mention of plastic, but turns out the cap is plastic, bottle cap is held on by plastic, and there's a plastic sticker on the top, won't be ordering again due to the unfortunate fact that there's just so much unnecessary amounts of plastic. Paper, adhesive and a metal cap would've sufficed to seal the probiotics. I guess the bottle was glass, that's cool, but the rest of it was plastic, so that completely ruins the whole "eco-friendly + vegan" image.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best probiotic I've ever used. I suffer from ibs and this works the best for me. I love that it is all organic as well. Currently pregnant and going everyday no problems. I'm glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love these...
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking the same probiotic for over a year and wanted to try something new and I really liked that these were organic and were a pre and probiotic in one! But my stomach did not agree with these at all so bad to the point I was having so many “bathroom issues” I had scheduled to see a colon specialist until I realized the only thing I changed was my probiotic...I stopped taking the Ora Trust Your Gut and went back to my beloved probiotic and everything went back to normal; no specialist needed. Trust Your Gut!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Essentially Costly & Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I’d decided to spend a bit more cash on a quality probiotic for a change & went with this brand. I’ve had better results purchasing a regular $4 Kefir drink a grocery store. This product did nothing for me. I even added it to other fermented yogurt, kimchi, sauerkraut to see if it would increase their potency. Nothing. Normally I see the fizz after adding probiotics to these foods. Maybe I got a “dead” batch... but certainly wasn’t worth paying extra for.
customer_reviews.author: FER THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Vegan friendly - LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a vegan and it works very well for me. I have already reordered my second bottle and will continue to do so. I do highly recommended trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby549

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I no longer feel bloated. It helps with skin complexion. I only take three days a week. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Hays

customer_reviews.title: Good for the tummy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for few days and my experience is very good taking this probiotics. They are easy for the tummy and I saw a difference on bloating eight away after couple of uses. The pricing is on the higher side but I guess most good probiotics are a bit expensive. I like the fact that are vegan and have and you don’t have to refrigerate them. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been hearing about the importance of a healthy gut. I consider myself a healthy person but with all the colds and germs going around I really want to increase my Immune system. This product has everything I was looking for without having the need for refrigeration. Love that fact. I can take capsules with me which is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for People with Allergies and Food Sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Ora Organic Probiotics with Prebiotics for about year and I have been very happy with the product. I have a variety of food sensitivities and finding any supplement can be very difficult and keeping good gut health is a must for me for my over all health. My husband started taking it in the last few months and has also been happy with it. I have also used it to make coconut yogurt in the InstaPot and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: CJZ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and it works
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve been using this for 3 weeks and I’ve seen a good improvement. I feel all around better and I will Definitely continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shiloah Nicolay

customer_reviews.title: First probiotic my body can handle!
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time taking probiotics. Either they don’t work or it’s too much for my stomach and I end up becoming really itchy from them. Enter Ora. I don’t know if it’s the prebiotic or taking them with food vs on an empty stomach, but it feels like something my stomach and entire body can handle. I’d definitely recommend these, especially since they’re organic and vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O’Brien

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but it's pretty pricy for a probiotic...would recommend trying to find a similar product that works just as well but is a fraction of the cost. The plus side is that the bottle is glass so its easy to recycle and you don't have to worry about BPAs from plastic interfering with the microorganisms.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Give these pills time!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for years. I am sensitive to everything and I haven’t had any issues. If you order directly from Ora Organic, and you order these, you will receive an email to let you know you will bloat and be gassy for 1-2 weeks. You have to stick through it. It’s actually killing the bad bacteria and building up the good bacteria in your gut. Once that is over you won’t have any symptoms and it truly is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed, product dried up and went bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought these while transitioning to a vegan diet less than 3 months ago. They were stored as directed, in a dark cool place out of sunlight. Not refrigerated because it says not needed. Product is no longer in powder form, has gone hard as a rock inside the capsule. I do not trust that this is safe, looks expired and bad.
customer_reviews.author: Saffron Rivett

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotics I've ever taken
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product now for about 3 weeks and I can tell the tremendous difference in the way my stomach feels I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pre & Pro is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these capsules are bringing balance to my microbiome. I would enjoy a lower cost to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product and I LOVE this company...I'm a happy vegan!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these when I was trying to come back from being sick a stomach parasite and I bounced back faster than imaginable and have never felt better since I continued to take them. I wasn't sure what probiotic to order from Ora, so I called the company directly and they took the time to explain the difference between each and what they would recommend. I love this company so much and love that all of their products are vegan. I'm sold and they now have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Lott

customer_reviews.title: Decrease in bloat!
customer_reviews.text: This product does a pretty good job of helping regulate digestion. Within a week of taking consistently, noticeable regularity. Also, huge improvement in bloating! Vegan pills and they have no flavor. Noticed a help if have sensitivity to dairy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Islandofpurbali

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second order/month of these and I'm very happy. I rated four stars because I feel like they're quite expensive, especially for a monthly supply, but the delivery was fast, the packaging is really lovely and most importantly they have helped my digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frequent but satisfying bathroom trips
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been vegan for about six months, and I recently became more health conscientious. After learning the benefits of probiotics I decided to try out the vegan variety. Without being TOO graphic, I can say that I have more bowel movements than ever before which leaves me feeling less bloated and comfortable throughout the entire day. Definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a rainbow of brands in probiotics never quite satisfied and always curious to try a new one. But actually I think this probiotic brand has stopped that trend in it's tracks. I felt such a difference even after just a few days, digestion is flowing wonderfully and feeling the extra absorption of nutrition from my food.

customer_reviews.title: Pre- AND Pro- biotic combined!
customer_reviews.text: Helped reduce stomach bloating and waste elimination. Organic Pre- AND Pro-biotic together. Found that taking a probiotic without a prebiotic is a waste of money and time. This product seems to work well for me.

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a sensitive gut and bloating problems for years. All this did was make me more bloated and backed up. No idea why it didn’t work but definitely not recommending this.

customer_reviews.author: MrsHaro

customer_reviews.text: I started taking Ora probiotic/prebiotic in October of last year after a very serious intestinal bacterial infection. Since this bacteria can return, taking Ora has kept me symptom free for over 5 months.

customer_reviews.text: So far the best organic one I've tried. Just the right strength. When I go higher/lower on the bacteria/flora my gut is not happy.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product after being on different probiotics for a year, just to try something new. I am really pleased with this product and will reorder. This is the first one that I notice a true difference on the days I take it and the ones where I forget.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a probiotic for a while. The Ingredients look quality, it’s organic certified and the package quality is very nice. Still early to tell of it will improve my quality of life but I’m happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: chance

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Really focusing on healing my gut. These probiotics don't leave my nauseous & the bottle is so beautiful on my shelf. These started working after ~7 days. I've stopped having stomach pain since switching to a plant based diet in conjunction with these probiotics. Definitely subscribing!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Marshia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only probiotic I use now. I love that it also contains prebiotic. I noticed a difference after the first bottle and can tell the difference if I don't take it consistently. This is a premium product with quality ingredients and I will continue to use it as part of my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product is a very good quality probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of probiotics and this one is my favorite.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Loved how it came in a glass bottle and not plastic. I would recommend this to everybody!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vegan pre/probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, improves gut health, and noticeable difference in belly bloat.

customer_reviews.title: Love the pre/pro combo capsule
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the difference within the first 24 hrs. I tak 1 with my morning meal and sometimes one with evening meal. I really only need 1 daily to benefit.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because the normal ones I order jumped in price. I didn’t notice a difference

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few different kinds, but this is the best one I’ve had so far. I really love that I can trust what I’m putting in my body and that I can feel a difference (better) when I take these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The company needs to change the bottle lid to be of better quality
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that when I removed the tamper wrap in the lid, the lid came to pieces as if it was broken and hanging on by the wrap. So now I am looking for a container to put the product in. The company needs to invest in a better lid. The product is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Chezel Longawa

customer_reviews.title: Helps with sugar cravings
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins. Pricey but worth it. Helps cut down on my sugar crabings and helps with my digestion.
customer_reviews.author: El Fin

customer_reviews.title: Effective Vegan Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I've finishing up my first bottle and am very pleased with this probiotic. I also appreciate that it is made in the USA, is completely vegan (even the capsule), easy to swallow, doesn't need to be refrigerated, and comes in a glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: TxMom

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I love that it's all natural and my stomach feels better.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Redden

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using probiotics and I can't get over how much better I feel! I have been using Ora for several months and it has totally been a game changer. Would recommend for anyone looking for a vegan probiotic. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can someone make this right?
customer_reviews.text: I love this probiotic, Iv been taking this brand for months. Works amazing.. The only issue now is that my pills will end up going bad before I finish them in a month..... waste of money if the bottle is open constantly. I hope someone can reach out to me or help me fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brickman

customer_reviews.title: good but spendy
customer_reviews.text: I wish the labels on the bottle were not impossible to remove.... nice cobalt glass bottles that would be great to reuse.

customer_reviews.text: I just started this so but so far so good. I love that it has prebiotics and that the ingredients are very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: A must need for those with GI issues!
customer_reviews.text: I've had GI issues for years, and this product drastically improves those issues. A number of probiotics contain milk, which is an issue for me. The fact that this contains nothing harsh or hard to digest, drastically makes it better than the next product in line.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and quality! Just wish it was a little less in cost.
customer_reviews.author: LisaM

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive stomachs
customer_reviews.text: I have a really really sensitive stomach and these didn’t make me feel sick. A great replacement for anyone who uses the Align brand. The brands transparency is also really helpful. I’ll be using it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Salley

product_meta.title: Ora Organic Probiotics with Prebiotics - Vegan Prebiotic and Probiotic for Digestive Health | Dairy-Free, Gluten-Free, for Sensitive Stomachs - 60 Easy-Swallow, Vegan Capsules, 1 Month Supply
feature_bullets: 16 BILLION CFU PER SERVING, 6 PROBIOTIC STRAINS: We use strains selected for their well studied health benefits. Strains include Lactobacillus Acidophilus, Lactobacillus Reuteri, Bifodobacterium Bifidum, Bifidobacterium Breve, Bifidobacterium Lactis, Bifidobacterium Longum.

ORGANIC & VEGAN PROBIOTICS WITH PREBIOTICS: Our premium quality, vegan probiotic supplement blend is developed in plant-based cultures. Additionally, this product is, as always, certified made with organic, free of gluten, dairy, GMOs, and soy.
ORGANIC PREBIOTICS INCLUDED: Prebiotics are what fuels probiotics. As such, our powder includes prebiotic fiber from organic Jerusalem artichoke and organic tapioca.

GREAT FOR SENSITIVE STOMACHS: Don’t take our word for it. Trust your gut and our already satisfied customers who say things like: “Hands down the best probiotic available. I deal with stomach issues daily, and this is the only probiotic that has reduced my issues substantially. These are worth every penny.”

COMPACT AND ROAD READY: Our probiotics come in easy-to-swallow vegan pullulan capsules, which ensure acid-resistance and survival in your gut. They are also freeze dried to keep them active without refrigeration, (similar to how it is done with active dry yeast used in baking) making them easy to transport and travel with.
